name: Milo's Day Out
description:
What a beautiful summer's day. Great time to take Milo out for a little stroll through the park. Gotta be careful, though... Milo likes balloons...

Glad we brought our super-duper-upgradable-high-accuracy dart gun.

Use your mouse to aim and left click to fire your darts.

Stop Milo from floating away and ping Money Milo's plane when it flies around for a bit of cash.

Made in 48hrs for GMTK Game Jam 2020 - 'Out of Control'

Known Bug: If the scaling is off, adjust the window size and it should snap to 16:9.
